name: GWJ-48-SuperMoonDefender
description:
Welcome to Super Moon Defender and entry for the Godot Wild Jam 48 - Moon.

Defend your meager base from the aliens! Don't forget to destroy their pods or you become overwhelmed quickly!

Known Issues:

Aiming is a bit rough, to compensate I increased the spray radius. It's my first time making a TPS and using IK for aiming.

Movement  of the aliens are a bit erratic at times

Controls:

WASD - Movement

L-SHIFT - Sprint

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Aim Down Sights

T - Flashlight Toggle

Credits:

Game Design and Code: Sezotove

Models: Xandruher

Sound: Marco Postman
